title: Collaborative e-Learning Design Workshop for Problem-Based Learning and Social Media Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Process for pre-service teachers to develop solutions for language education challenges using social media tools, based on learner agency and collaboration

learning_goals: Learners can apply the three core elements of PBL (problem, process, solution) to language education scenarios.
Learners can design a learning environment that utilizes social media tools for collaborative knowledge sharing and reflective practice.
Learners can develop a PBL-social media integrated assessment system that balances learner autonomy and instructor support.

resources: Social Media Platform (Twitter, FedForum, etc.) Access Permissions

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
